title: Trials for the Chalet School
description: It is not the fact that Naomi Elton "has been left slightly deformed as a result of an accident some years before" that worries the staff at the Chalet School; it is more the warning note from her guardian that her disability "has warped her mind".After some discussion the mistresses decide they can do no better than to turn Naomi over to head girl Mary-Lou Trelawney for guidance.
author: Elinor M. Brent-Dyer
